text:
e="preserve">Wilbert McClure (October 29, 1938 – August 6, 2020) was an American boxer. He was an amateur. He won gold medals in the light middleweight division at the 1959 Pan American Games and the 1960 Olympics. As a professional he competed from 1961 to 1970.
McClure was born in Toledo, Ohio. He died on August 6, 2020 at the age of 81.
